local_intent: Align for side push and execute the first 0.1 m push at 45 degrees on t_block, verifying post-push visibility.
assumptions: Contact with the block is already established upstream or is achievable via approach without explicit contact check
coherence_with_global: Matches the global sequence around the first transfer: visibility recovery via scan, detection, precise align, set yaw=90, perform the 45-degree push, then sanity-check visibility.
